attributes.action: Make it illegal for Monty Python  to create another stage show out of their rubbish films
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has recently been reported that some members of the Monty Python team are thinking of making The Life of Brian into a stage musical in a similar manner to Spamalot.  Monty Python is not funny and there should  be a law to stop them.  Please sign your agreement and keep these comedy has-beens firmly in the past where they belong.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
